name: Space Ace (itch)
description:
SPACE ACE

Become the Space Ace by taking on the Imperial Fleet.

20 Unique Waves, and an Endless Battalion of enemies!

Power upgrades that enable double-fire and rapid-fire!

A powerful Shield to absorb impact as you crush the enemy!

4 Unique Enemy types with Lasers, Electric Shields, and Homing Missiles!

Shoot for a 100k High Score! Or harder still... Claim your crown as the Space Ace by clearing all 20 Waves!
